com.turing123.robotframe.scenario

Interface IScenario

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IMainScenario

    public interface IScenario
    All scenario on robot must inherit from this interface

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ScenarioRuntimeConfig configScenarioRuntime(ScenarioRuntimeConfig config) 
      java.lang.String getScenarioAppKey() 
      boolean onExit()
      will be called when the Scenario is asked to exit this is synced call, the Frame will pauseTTS a period of time waiting for this Scenario exit, if not return in this certain time, the Frame goes its own logic and report an error.
      void onScenarioLoad()
      will be called when the Scenario being added into robot
      void onScenarioUnload()
      will be called when the Scenario being removed from robot
      boolean onStart()
      will be called when the Scenario is asked to launch up this is synced call, the Frame will pauseTTS a period of time waiting for this Scenario up, if not return in this certain time, the Frame goes its own logic and report an error.
      boolean onTransmitData(Behavior behavior)
      will be called when need Transmit data to the scenario
      boolean onUserInterrupted(int type, android.os.Bundle extra)
      will be called when this Scenario is interrupted by user this is synced call, the Frame will pauseTTS a period of time waiting for this Scenario handling this event, if not return in this certain time, the Frame goes its own logic and report and error

    • Method Detail

      • onScenarioLoad

        void onScenarioLoad()
        will be called when the Scenario being added into robot

      • onScenarioUnload

        void onScenarioUnload()
        will be called when the Scenario being removed from robot

      • onStart

        boolean onStart()
        will be called when the Scenario is asked to launch up this is synced call, the Frame will pauseTTS a period of time waiting for this Scenario up, if not return in this certain time, the Frame goes its own logic and report an error.
        Returns:
        true if scenario launched up successfully, false otherwise.

      • onExit

        boolean onExit()
        will be called when the Scenario is asked to exit this is synced call, the Frame will pauseTTS a period of time waiting for this Scenario exit, if not return in this certain time, the Frame goes its own logic and report an error.
        Returns:
        true if scenario exited successfully, false otherwise.

      • onTransmitData

        boolean onTransmitData(Behavior behavior)
        will be called when need Transmit data to the scenario
        Returns:
        true if scenario receive data successfully, false otherwise.

      • onUserInterrupted

        boolean onUserInterrupted(int type,
                          android.os.Bundle extra)
        will be called when this Scenario is interrupted by user this is synced call, the Frame will pauseTTS a period of time waiting for this Scenario handling this event, if not return in this certain time, the Frame goes its own logic and report and error
        Parameters:
        type - Interrupt Type SystemConfig.INTERRUPT_TYPE_VOICE SystemConfig.INTERRUPT_TYPE_TOUCH SystemConfig.INTERRUPT_TYPE_OTHER SystemConfig.INTERRUPT_TYPE_LEFT_HAND SystemConfig.INTERRUPT_TYPE_LEFT_HAND_LONG SystemConfig.INTERRUPT_TYPE_RIGHT_HAND SystemConfig.INTERRUPT_TYPE_RIGHT_HAND_LONG SystemConfig.INTERRUPT_TYPE_HEAD SystemConfig.INTERRUPT_TYPE_HEAD_LONG
        extra - Some Interrupt extra info.
        Returns:
        true if this Scenario handled this event, false otherwise. If false, the Frame will handle in default behavior, would probably interrupt all Function and ask this Scenario exit.

      • getScenarioAppKey

        java.lang.String getScenarioAppKey()
        Returns:
        the scenario's appKey. The appKey must be obtained from Turing Developer Platform .

      • configScenarioRuntime

        ScenarioRuntimeConfig configScenarioRuntime(ScenarioRuntimeConfig config)
